seo.title: Manarola Attractions 2025 | What to See & Do
seo.description: Discover Manarola's top attractions: Church of San Lorenzo, harbor swimming, sunset viewpoints, and the iconic colorful houses.

body.title: Sights & Attractions
body.subtitle: Explore the most photographed village in Italy. Historic churches, spectacular viewpoints, and charming harbor scenes.

features.title: Classic Harbor View
features.description: The iconic photo spot showing colorful houses stacked up the cliff. Best at sunset.

features.title: Church of San Lorenzo
features.description: 14th-century Gothic church with beautiful rose window. Built in 1338.

features.title: Marina & Swimming Rocks
features.description: Rocky swimming area with crystal-clear water. Popular for cliff jumping and sunbathing.

features.title: Punta Bonfiglio
features.description: Cemetery viewpoint offering the best sunset panorama of the village and harbor.

features.title: Via Discovolo
features.description: Main street lined with colorful houses, shops, and cafes. The heart of village life.

features.title: Terraced Vineyards
features.description: Ancient wine terraces clinging to the cliffs. Walk among them on vineyard trails.
